thread.title: Comment on Katina and her girls are ready for “The View” by Go Ahead
thread.title_full: Comment on Katina and her girls are ready for “The View” by Go Ahead

author: Go Ahead
title: Comment on Katina and her girls are ready for “The View” by Go Ahead
text:
Posted in Basketball , Main | 12 Responses 
Katina Powell and her daughters Rod-Ni and Lindsay are in New York City this morning for an appearance on “The View.” The show starts right now on ABC, but I had to share this picture of the trio in Times Square of the three with Mickey Mouise, Elmo, and Grover Cookie Monster. 
The best part? Katina’s wearing a Louisville sweatshirt. She was part of the recruiting team, after all. The only way this picture could be any better is if Rod-Ni had written “L-Mo” in the caption instead. Article written by Mrs. Tyler Thompson No, I will not make you a sandwich, but you can follow me on Twitter @MrsTylerKSR or email me . 12 responses to “Katina and her girls are ready for “The View”” Damon October 23, 2015 at 11:17 am | Permalink | Reply 
That’s Cookie Monster, not Grover. Yeah, that’s the problem with this post. October 23, 2015 at 11:31 am | Permalink | Reply 
Just some whores wanting attention. But glad they are getting it lol. #L1CWhore poles October 23, 2015 at 11:36 am | Permalink | Reply 
Is it just me or is it kind of funny that the bar in the middle looks like a pole? UK Terry October 23, 2015 at 11:39 am | Permalink | Reply 
The story will continue to stall until the money source is learned. That is the ticking time bomb. If it was a booster, a mere slap on the wrist. If internal, (aka “Coach Mike”), BOOM goes the dynamite. leon singleton October 23, 2015 at 11:43 am | Permalink | Reply 
Come to Louisvill as a boy and leave as a man. Rick October 23, 2015 at 11:48 am | Permalink | Reply 
A d…..my car was stolen from my driveway. Cousin Eddie October 23, 2015 at 11:51 am | Permalink | Reply 
She actually came across as pretty pathetic today. Disappointing. Jackie Childs October 23, 2015 at 11:58 am | Permalink | Reply 
The stories keep swirling around but one angle no one has seemed to pursue is the benefit to UL and Pitino angle. People trying to shift all blame to McGee are calling him a rogue employee and equating his misdeeds to an employee that steals from the cash register. The problem with that analogy is that McGee helped UL recruit the best era in UL basketball in 30 years and got them multiple final fours and an NCAA title. Rick Pitino, U of L, Jurich, fans, Yum! Center, Bud Light etc etc – everyone benefited from UL’s surprise success once some of these recruits, alleged to have had sex with these girls, started playing for Rick. Rick just wants to know why it happened but are we to believe he never asked himself why are my recruits all of the sudden good enough to make my teams consistently be in the top 10 ??? WOW!!! October 23, 2015 at 12:00 pm | Permalink | Reply 
She is PATHETIC October 23, 2015 at 12:12 pm | Permalink 
Which makes the fact that her story is true even sadder… Flux October 23, 2015 at 12:27 pm | Permalink | Reply 
I hate da tards. But her interview only helped uofl. Her story keeps changing. Scott Cox just came out and said McGee wasn’t even in town on the day she claims he told her Rick Knew. She said he told her in a hallway. Plus, she said Harell nailed her daughter on a recruiting visit. That was 2012. Yet, she claims her daughters didn’t get involved until 2013. I bet the uofl lawyers hope she does a couple more interviews. Wish she would stop while she is behind. The old lady said she has relations with Williams. He left in 09 and she said it didn’t start until 2010. Go Ahead October 23, 2015 at 12:47 pm | Permalink 
Sure, you hate da tards. Doesn’t matter how many interviews she does. The program is going down in a heap, regardless. Post Comment - New and Improved (not really, it just works now)
